website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, hydrating body oil that won't leave you feeling greasy after use.
pros: Keeps skin hydrated without making it greasy
Use alone or in combination with other oils
cons: A few customers have complained that their bottle leaks around the cap

website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and totally pure almond oil that is great for skin and hair and for mixing.
pros: Non-GMO, expeller-pressed sweet almond oil that is great for hair, skin, and making your own skincare products
Absorbs well into the skin – not greasy or heavy
cons: Plastic squeeze cap can leak and some have had issues with mold growing in the lid

customer_reviews.title: This oil is not sweet almond oil! Very Watery
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this oil before and I loved it the first time. I use it on my skin for hyperpigmentation and my skin has cleared dramatically. Unfortunately this second bottle I ordered has had a negative affect on my Skin. this is my second time odering and this is not the same oil. I compared the two and they are definitely not the same. The first oil was thick and had a smell. This second oil was watered down and smelled nothing like the first oil. This oil is definitely fake and is nothing similar to the first bottle I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: nakita

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever !
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a trip to Mexico and I would always peel. Started using this almond oil on day one after my shower and haven’t peeled yet. I HATE anything greasy but this soaks in my skin so fast, after 5 min it just feels soft. I use it daily on my face and it has actually cleared up my skin. A 16 oz bottle lasts me almost a year. I threw out all my chemical filled lotions any only use this. If I can’t pronounce the ingredients, it doesn’t go on my body.
customer_reviews.author: FancyPants

customer_reviews.title: At first I didn't think I would like it because it's much thicker
customer_reviews.text: I've used Neutrogena's oil for well over a decade and was hesitant to switch. But I wanted to be healthier and thought maybe this product would have less chemicals. At first I didn't think I would like it because it's much thicker. However, I found it to be much better than what I was using before as it lasts much longer and deeply hydrates. Normally by the end of the day my skin would be dry with Nuet. But I find this making my skin smooth and not too oily even a day later. I don't love the smell of almond's, but luckily is extremely faint.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Best baby massage oil
customer_reviews.text: We tried Coconut, Olive and Mustard oil for my baby but nothing worked to his body. He used to get lot of rashes after massage. We do massage twice a day with enough quantity. Finally “NOW solutions” Almond oil worked perfectly for him and he didn’t get any rashes. His body absorbs this oil quickly so we never felt oily after massage. Also this oil is the best replacement for baby moisturizing cream for winter. It’s very good for sensitive skin. I found only one issue that is; it didn’t change his skin color after using so many times for the last one month. Otherwise it’s a perfect 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: AKumar

customer_reviews.title: It had no smell/scent at all.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the smell of sweet almond oil, so for me to have purchased this larger sized bottle, and it not have a scent at all, took me by surprise. Despite this, the oil has very good benefits for the hair and skin, so I'm sure I'll still use it until it's gone but I will make sure the next one I buy (even if it's a different brand), will have the sweet almond oil scent to it.)
customer_reviews.author: T. Bostic

customer_reviews.title: This is a knock off, not real product!
customer_reviews.text: NOW sweet almond oil purchased in stores smells like sweet almond oil, this product has no scent! Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Christina brinton

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALMOND OIL
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand of almond oil for months for my daughter skin after baths. I reordered and was sent an opened bottle containing a very thin odorless oil-not almond oil! Almond oil is thicker and has a sweet nutty aroma. The oil I was sent was thin and had no odor. Completely appalled that a company would sell a mysterious oil packaged in a false bottle. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake product! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand many times and I love to use sweet almond oil for my homemade moisturizer. This is the first time I ordered from amazon. My first shipment the product was damaged and spilled all over the box. My replacement is totally not sweet almond oil! It has a dark amber color and smells rancid! Sweet almond oil is pale yellow and has a pleasant scent. This sucks because I cannot return. Lesson learned ...I will be buying locally instead.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS. ITS FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Stay away!! When I first bought this product it smelled just like how almond oil is supposed to smell and it was a slightly thicker oil, not watery like vegetable oil. This second bottle.. omgggg... so watery, NO smell at all and broke my skin out. This is NOT almond oil. And what makes it worse is, you can't return the product..... shame
customer_reviews.author: siobhan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose to order from Amazon, for the conveniency, after getting this Almond oil from the GNC for years. This bottle has a watery consistency and the color is dark. Almond oil is slightly less watery and a light color. I uploaded pics to show. So I’m not sure about the quality, or if this NOW oil has been altered? The lighter oil is the GNC oil, dark is Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase this oil
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t what I expected. The Sweet Almond oil doesn’t have a scent. It feels like a mixer of cheap, inexpensive, low grade, oils. I do NOT recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: I love “Now” products but this ain’t it!!! I have Brought now products before and this is a complete knock off. Absolutely no sweet almond sent and no moisture idk what to compare this to but cooking oil, smells and feels like! The only thing I’m happy about if my refund of the 3 bottles I brought. I do not recommend this product from this merchant at all!!
customer_reviews.author: blaquerose

customer_reviews.title: Putrid Smell
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of Sweet Almond Oil so I didn't know what it should smell like. My bottle smelled rank, that's the only way to describe it. I tried using a small amount in my body wash, but even lavender essential oil couldn't mask the smell. I won't buy this brand again. I just purchased a new bottle of a different brand and lo and behold, there is no smell. I'll use this one from now on. I have other products of the NOW brand and they are good, but this oil was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Zenad

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: The best oil for dry skin! I've been using this on my face and neck for about a year now and I'm extremely pleased. My complexion has never been better. I've recently started using it on my entire body including hair. So far, great! I recommend. There's no scent, which I prefer. No more face creams, this oil really is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Pure almond oil?
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this product before and loved it...this time, however, it smells like old vegetable oil and is much darker in color...NOT almond oil. Not happy. I’ve included a pic of the two bottles side by side...the one on the left is my old bottle that’s almost gone but the light colored oil can still be seen at the bottom of the bottle. The new bottle on the right is much darker colored and has an old/rancid smell. Going to contact Amazon and see if they’ll fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie G.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have pcos i suffer from cystic acne all my life I am 26 years old I have used everything from Sephora creams to Bloomingdales nothing is as good as this stuff I also have super oily skin but when I use this my skin feels super soft I have seeing that my skin has not suffer any breakout and my scars are minimizing I have used sooooo many brightening creams but this works magic I’ve used this for a few months and a little goes a looong way I only use this at night also good for all over body after shave amazing
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is your holy grail, trust me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using baby oil for years now when I get out of the shower and it always left a weird slimy feeling so I decided to try the sweet almond oil. THIS STUFF IS WONDERFUL. It is so moisturizing and nourishing and doesn’t leave a weird/nasty feel on your skin. I get compliments all the time on how soft my skin is since I have been using it. I also apply a small amount to my eyes/ eyelashes and it has helped with my dark circles and helped my lashes grow! Trust me, give this sweet almond oil a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & great value
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this almond oil. Not only is it very moisturizing, it absorbs really nicely not leaving a greasy or oily presence. I chose to start using almond oil on my hands because I’m a massage therapist & esthetician. I wash my hands a lot because of my profession for hygienic purposes plus not wanting to cross contaminate with the wide range of products I use. It has really helped me avoid getting hang nails & my skin is sensitive so it’s a great choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken plastic cap. No scent and I didn't notice that it moisurizes
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing age lines
customer_reviews.text: I read that almond oil is a good way to reduce age lines on the face. I'm 50 years old now. I have been using this olive oil on my face, specifically on the age lines which are forming on my forehead and on the sides of my eyes, for 2 months. I was pleasantly surprised when one of my friends asked me what I was doing to look so young. Then, my mother-in-law asked if I was doing something because my age lines are less noticeable. I told them about this project and both said they would be ordering some for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: JVib

customer_reviews.title: NOT SWEET ALMOND OIL - DO NOT BUY HERE!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what this is but it is NOT SWEET ALMOND OIL I have purchased in the past. THE SAO I HAVE PURCHASED IN THE PAST HAS A HEAVIER CONSISTENCY AND DEFINITELY SMELLS OF ALMONDS. ALSO - READ CAREFULLY! YOU CANNOT RETURN IT! THE BOTTLE I RECEIVED HAD A BROKEN SEAL AND LOOSE CAP SO OIL WAS EVERYWHERE! I MAY NOT BE ABLE TO RETURN IT, BUT I WANT MY MONEY BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Analog Nation

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing, non-offensive oil for skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I only gave 4 stars because I’ve used other oils that have felt better in my skin, but this overall just does exactly what it should do and it absorbs nicely and doesn’t get your skin all oily. I have sensitive skin and this works great for me. I sometimes add it to my lotion to give the lotion a moisturizing boost while I live out west in the desert. I’d prefer to use sesame oil on my skin but the smell has in the past destroyed too many clothes and bedding/towels so I prefer overall this indented almond oil.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: I was going extremely disappointed in this product I used to use baby oil then the Neutrogena Oil then coconut oil, I decided to try this and the first day was fine but within three days I had broken out everywhere but only in the spots I put lotion on. It almost reminded me of vegetable oil even the scent. It was weird and clogged my pores. Definitely going back to the old stuff. Not for sensitive skin at all! It’s been almost a month and I have bumps that are still healing!
customer_reviews.author: Faith place-hodge

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this oil!
customer_reviews.text: This sweet almond oil is wonderful! After I found it I stopped using any of the make-up remover lotions or gels. This oil is irreplaceable when it comes to remove any make-up (mascara and foundation): all you need to do is to wet a cotton pad in warm water and put a few drops of oil on the wet pad, and then you clean your face. Also, it is great to use instead of face or body lotions. I often mix this oil with a little bit of a tanning body lotion - works even better than tanning lotion alone. Also, this oil is great as a hair mask. It's just a great, natural, healthy product to use!
customer_reviews.author: I.Des.

customer_reviews.title: Many Uses! :)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light oil for all skin types. I use it for mixing my own skin products, or to supplement my store bought lotions. Absorbs pretty quickly if you do not use too much! Also, pretty good for the ends of curly hair or as a DIY deep conditioner when mixed with conditioner or something. Good price; absolutely love this brand!!!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeSpicyBrownCowTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not effective as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almond oil to make homemade moisturizer. I also tried it directly. By itself I was surprised how unmoisturizing it wa. I’ve used other oils and have experienced better success (such as with argon oil). I can’t say if the lack of effectiveness is because of this brand or because of almond oils in general but compared to other oils this did not work for moisture on my skin. Everyone is different so perhaps it’s possible this could be moisturizing for someone else just not me.
customer_reviews.author: JW is back

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for acne!
customer_reviews.text: I have adult acne, oily skin and to top it off my skin is extremely sensitive. I have been trying to go all natural with my skincare routine. I wash my face with African black soap (which is incredible!) and then I use the almond oil after. I am obsessed! My skin has never looked so good!! This oil does not have a scent, which I really like. . but I would like to add that unadulterated sweet almond oil does not typically have a scent. I also use a little in my hair! I am super pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Smelled Awful - rancid! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! It has rancid. I will never buy again any of NOW almond, grape seed, and avocado oils. I wish can get all money back! First when open, it had odd smells, then it developed a rancid smell within a month. trashed them all. I have buying most of NOW Essential Oil, unfortunately, even Essential Oil, only few are good.
customer_reviews.author: liv

customer_reviews.title: Great for nails, a little greasy though.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a carrier oil for my nails, I add emu oil, lavender and frankincense oil to it. I have been using it daily and have observed a noticeable difference in my nails. They are stronger and soft to the touch. The only downside is the oil is a little greasy and does not absorb into my skin completely, so I keep a wash cloth on hand to wipe away excess after I've rubbed into my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this oil and how it was rated so high. My experience is not so good. I put the oil before I even got out of the shower, giving it time to soak in. First I started to itch, and I mean a lot. I have no known allergies, so this was confusing. Second, the oil never soak into my skin. I waited to get dress for 45 mins giving it time to absorb. When i put my clothes on, the oil was soaked up[ by my clothes. The rash stayed for about 24 hours. If you have sensitive skin, or any major allergies I would recommend staying away from this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O. Newby

customer_reviews.title: Your skin will love you.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this is my absolutely favorite to moisturize with. I use to buy this at Whole Foods but they stopped carrying the now brand.bummer. So glad I was able to find on amazon and for a good price. This is a great and better alternative to those moisturizers with all the chemicals and ingredients you can pronounce. This oil is very nourishing without that greasy feel. Best way to use is right after the shower when skin is still damp. I also use this in my homemade body betters. The scent is light and not overpowering. A little goes a Long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Huda Beauty Referred
customer_reviews.text: Huda Posted this as her secret to getting rid of dark eye circles. 2 weeks of using it at night only and IT WORKS!! I’ve also been adding a few drops to my body moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: {sb}Cre8tive

customer_reviews.title: The Best All Natural Beauty Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using almond oil as a face & body moisturizer for several years now and it keeps my skin moisturized, smooth and soft. It's very versatile and can be used for a lot of DIY beauty recipes. It's great for removing makeup, as a face moisturizer, oil cleanser and if you have very sensitive skin like me it won't cause breakouts. It's a great carrier oil for essential oils. Plus it's very affordable and doesn't have the harmful ingredients that other moisturizers might have. This is a must-have ingredient in your beauty regime.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Says

customer_reviews.title: No almond scent
customer_reviews.text: I just received my oil. My first impression is that it’s not almond Oil. Smells nothing like almond. I get a whiff of regular vegetable oil. I’m not happy at all. Almond has got a distinct scent. Is this a genuine NOW product? Amazon please investigate the authenticity of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Wow! this stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I had read on-line somewhere where almond oil would remove dark spots. So I added it to my day and night cream. It's only been a week and my skin is already evenly toned! it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn anders

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil on my skin,hair, nails and face for a year now, and I have noticed such amazing benefits. My acne scars have lightened, my acne has been greatly reduced, and the health of my skin and hair and nails has just improved over all. Great value for the price. This has made my facial skin look younger as well and given me a lovely natural glow for the next day that isn’t greasy. Can be used as a carrier oil for other essential oils. Great but I use daily and still have half a bottle left after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Evanthia

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered without a lid
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed. Item Was delivered without a lid. I need to use this product tomorrow so I can’t return it, but now I have to find something to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Love almond oil 😍 Good product
customer_reviews.text: First off there’s no scent other than it smelling like vegetable oil which doesn’t bother me... I can’t review it for sensitive skin because I’m unsure as I do not have sensitive skin ! Overall the product is very moisturizing makes my body feel nice & oiled up. I’ve been using it for hair & acne benefits as almond oil dies help prevent acne so we shall see. Will post updates . Came well packaged no leaks or anything .
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I am currently pregnant and have weird skin issues, so I was looking for something that wouldn't make my skin worse. This is perfect! I have been using it twice a day: in the morning under my 100SPF sunscreen, and at night over my treatment cream. The best thing is that this doesn't make my face feel oily--seems odd to say that after directly applying oil to my face. It's true though! One other bonus: my toddler has had rough skin on the backs of her arms, and I tried putting this on her with great results! I love that it doesn't have harsh chemicals in it and that it is sensitive enough for her young skin!
customer_reviews.author: BoScha

customer_reviews.title: Almond Oil is Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Since the first time we tried almond oil for massage, my wife and I have been hooked. It is non-sticky, goes on very smoothly, does not stain sheets, and our skin absorbs most of it over time... we typically don't even have to shower afterwards. I cannot say enough good things about it. And NOW's product is among the best. It is clear, clean, and odorless... exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Thick and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: If you have VERY dry skin, this is a good product. I have used several types of oils for my skin and this one is pretty good. It is nice and thick--some oils I have used are very watery and therefore difficult to apply, but this is similar to the consistency of a good olive oil. It also is very moisturizing. The scent is light and slightly sweet. I generally prefer something with little to no scent so this works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil is amazing - Smells fresh and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this on my skin after taking a shower as it absorbs well and helps hold in moisture. I'm also going to use it in a body butter recipe. Some oils don't hold up well but this is very fresh! I noticed that it says it is an add-on item. My first order arrived in a padded bag with a broken lid and oil all over. The poor postal people double bagged it inside plastic and delivered it. Amazon corrected the issue and shipped the replacement in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Veg Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure it's just vegetable oil!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure what I received is just vegetable oil. It tastes nothing like sweet almond oil, has no almond scent, and tastes, smells, and feels exactly like the vegetable oil I get from the grocery store... Nothing like other almond oil I've bought before... Not sure what to think.
customer_reviews.author: Carren

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I live in hawaii and am constantly in the sun . After a long day at the beach I really need something moisturizing . I've been using this at night on my face and body right after a nice long shower and wow ! I'm in love . Hydrating and absorbs fully . I will be reordering for sure . Ps. A little goes a long way . Can't wait to see what this does for my cuticles
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Currently pregnant and I read up on how effective almond oil is for skin and belly. I have not gone a day without rubbing this all over and I must say my skin is softer then ever before
customer_reviews.author: kimberly bobe

customer_reviews.title: 100% pure
customer_reviews.text: Bottle arrived cracked, overall good product besides my bottle being cracked at the top
customer_reviews.author: Miss dia

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this stuff and I use it as my moisturizer every day. I'm very sensitive to scents and this one doesn't have a fragrance or any kind of chemical scent at all. It is super soft and makes my skin feel so clean and smooth. I even use it on my face twice a day after I wash and it never clogs my pores, which I was afraid it would do. I can't say enough about it. I don't even use lotion anymore since I started with almond oil a year or two ago. I use it on my entire body. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Healthy skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My skin feels silky after using it! I have 2 skin diseases so I am highly allergic to everything this doesn’t break me at all ! I love that it has no scent as well! You can use it around the eyes, hair , skin nails everything ! Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item after reading is good for pregnancy stretch marks. I brought it to one of my prenatal appointments and ask if I can use it and was given the clear sign it’s approved. I love how it’s not sticky, doesn’t have an and it moistures so good. I have been using it all over my body. Not sure if it will work for my stretch marks but it’s helping with the dry skin which is good enough for me
customer_reviews.author: StephanieVV

customer_reviews.title: No Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good quality oil but I purchased mistakenly thinking it had the sweet almond oil fragrance. I think they should make that more apparent.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love the moisture, but no scent
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE almond oil, and find it very easy to apply to my skin (I also love coconut oil, but find it more difficult to apply). However, I was hoping for the classic almond scent, which this product did not have. Perhaps for some the smell of almond oil is too strong, but I didn't see anything in the description that said it was scent-free. Other than that, a great oil.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: How sad for me
customer_reviews.text: I love NOW products but this one seem to cause my skin to react bad. Bumpy bad. I know almond oil is good at cleaning pores but my skin didn't like this one. Maybe I'll try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: It's good carrier or base oil. I use it for making shampoo and face wash for me and my 3 year old son and it works great Pouring is easy and it is value for money
customer_reviews.author: Avinanda Bawari

customer_reviews.title: It fades my stretch marks of pregnancy and lighten my bikini lines
customer_reviews.text: First thing to say , i may sound like sales people but i swear i am not , i bought this as my mom and grandmom advice as i am an old school person and believe in home /kitchen remedies , brief , this was for the purpose of fading my pregnancy stretch marks on my belly and thights and it works to lighten bikini lines and straighten my hair and lighten even my hair dye color i have baught it twice thus year i believe and even i got one at an arabic regional store almond oil does magic with the skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. Thick enough without being too thick and moisturizing without being greasy. I bought this to use on my baby’s cradle cap and her very dry skin. It works very well and is not irritating at all. I mix it with now Grapeseed oil which is lighter and the combo makes a nice moisturizer which is perfect for the dry winter months
customer_reviews.author: NickyC

customer_reviews.title: Skin Glowing!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a temporary thing but I'm trying this as a facial moisturizer as the final step in routine and my skin looks amaaaazing with this on it, like dewy and glowing. It absorbs in eventually but my dry skin gets very well moisturized from this (and no acne)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews for this sweet almond oil someone said it had a bad odor. It does not. My legs have been so dry the skin was flaking and no matter what cream I used nothing helped. This almond oil has been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this the first night, and was absolutely shocked when I woke in the morning! My skin looked flawless !! I am throwing out my OLAY and L'Oreal night creams !!! I used this with a rose quartz roller, the results are dramatic! Don't hesitate to purchase the almond oil!
customer_reviews.author: mary beth johnson

customer_reviews.title: Almond oil
customer_reviews.text: This product will be fine. My question was whether or not it is NSF certified —and it is not. A helpful person replied that it was. True, it is certified Non-GMO. NSF would’ve told me that it was indeed almond oil. It probably is and the other brands probably are as well. The NSF I would know exactly what was in it and that nothing else was—important to know For sure what we are putting in or on our bodies.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have acne prone skin. I don’t usually use oils on my face but I heard that sweet almond oil is good for people with acne and other skin problems. I love this oil. It’s not to oily or thick. It doesn’t make you feel oil . It’s actually moisturizing and light. There isn’t really any scent. My face does look visibly healthier and brighter when it is applied. I think it is well worth the price. I would continue to buy this oil .
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Mild, moisturizes, fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of recipe for foaming hand wash, which I made as christmas gifts. I now use this after a shower to moisturize my skin. I apply it after the shower while still wet, before toweling dry. I normally have very dry skin in the winter and there are scratch marks on my shoulders most of the season. I noticed my skin does not itch from dryness this winter. I love how it makes my skin feel. NOW brand continues to please.
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: Second Shipment was a different product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product twice. The first shipment looked, felt, and smelled like sweet almond oil. It was great and worked great on my skin. As a result, I ordered a second bottle. However, the second bottle was very different. I first suspected there was a problem with the oil when it initially arrived. It looked darker than any other almond oil I've purchased. Nevertheless, against my better judgment I opened the product and it produced a strong smell. It smelled almost like olive oil. In addition, it was a heavier oil, which made me strongly believe I received olive oil with a almond oil label.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this on skin and hair so far and I love it! It doesn’t have much of a scent that I can tell, but it’s a really nice consistency and very moisturizing. I’ve used it as a scalp treatment and was blown away by the results and I’ve started using it mixed with lotion for some extra moisture on the body and I love that too. I would definitely recommend this oil, the possibilities for uses seem endless!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Want order this again
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to smell good and it don’t smell at all. Not happy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Garmany

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: - Great for hair, body, and face - I use it to make shea butter cream, body oil, and an oil face cleanser - It doesnt really have a scent, at least compared to other oils (looking at you castro oil) - Not a thick consistency either
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Different than Jaffra Royal Almond Oil
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent and it is quite a bit lighter then the Jaffra version. That may be a plus for some people' but personally, I love the "cherry" smell. Jaffra's is quite thick and leaves oily film...but is very effective for really dry skin. This one is lighter and will absorb quickly. Unsure about lasting results. It is also alot cheaper....I may consider mixing the two. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A

customer_reviews.title: Neck Pain gone with this oil massage
customer_reviews.text: I have neck pain from several months , some one told me about this oil to massage on the neck . Believe or not i used this oil for three days to massage my neck and now my 90% pain is gone. I bribe my son to massage by neck and shoulders every night before i go bed and looks like it is helping with my neck pain . I also start taking vitamin D and Calcium supplements too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I agree with a lot of the other reviews--this isn't the real formula. It has NO smell whatsoever and the product in stores has a very distinctive smell. So far its been 2 days of using and my skin does not feel as supple as it usually does when I use this from the store. Will probably return
customer_reviews.author: Raven O

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good quality and, great price! Am very pleased with this product and the speedy shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Try it you’ll like it
customer_reviews.text: I always used olive oil tried it once so far really like it a lot leaves the skin extremely smooth and soft I’ll definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy more because my roommate stole mine, it’s really good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: William Dobson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I use this for alot of things so I love it, I find it worth the money and its value is off the charts. I use it and add to my bath water with basil oil or tea tree. Or with Himalayan salt for a soak. It works wonders on my hair and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Culinary Secret

customer_reviews.title: Olive oil in almond oil bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered almond oil before and when opening this bottle I thought it looked different than I remembered, much darker than the first time. I continued to put it on and the smell reminded me of olive oil. I used it another time to make sure I wasn’t tripping and the smell reminded me of olive oil again. This sucks because if I wanted olive oil I could have just gone to the kitchen. Now I’m wondering if this oil is sweet almond oil at all or if I’ve just been played. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer!in a week I see a difference in my skin!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect body oil
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets really dry so I ordered this on a whim and am so glad I did. I put this on my body every night after I shower and it absorbs really well and does not leave my skin oily at all like some other oils. do. It is super moisturizing and also unscented which I really like. Great product and I will definitely reorder when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: cl johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This sweet almond oil is so nice! I use it as a sort of hair mask by braiding it into my hair the night before I shower. I also put it on the tips of my hair after a shower. I use it on my face before bed to keep my skin from getting dry and scaly. It works on everything: My face is nice and soft, and my hair is stronger, softer, and looks healthier. The only warning is that it IS, in fact, OIL, so if you put it all over your hair after a shower, your hair will look oily. :)
customer_reviews.author: yay ILNP

customer_reviews.title: Clean pure almost scentless oil that does not stain
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it to keep her skin from drying out and as a makeup remover and I have been using it to help stabilize my very oily skin. It has been very successful at the first a very helpful on the second. One very nice thing about the this oil is that it absorbs into the skin without leaving an oily residue thus not staining anything.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The cap came broken and leaked everywhere, tried to tape it back on, but since it's oil, didn't stick, so once it got knocked over instantly lost all of it. Did want to go through a long refund procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Keir

customer_reviews.title: Looooooove it
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first time purchasing this Almond oil and it will not be my last. Still very satisfied with the product. Came sealed and ready for me to buss it open and lather myself in it. It doesn't have a scent which is a great thing, sometimes I like to add some of my essential oils and tings for a personalized scent. A little goes a long way -- you can probably moisturize half of your body with a palm sized dollop...if that. I hope you enjoy this product as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: EMoney

customer_reviews.title: No Scent, No Oily Residue
customer_reviews.text: Been using this as a all-over body moisturizer after a shower for some time now. My skin just absorbs it in, hence no oily residue. No marks on clothing, nor on furniture when I sit after applying. The grayness I have on my legs during the cold months is gone and my skin looks healthy and dewy. Really do like what it does and how my skin looks after application.
customer_reviews.author: LMH1917

customer_reviews.title: Almond oil
customer_reviews.text: I use almond oil in my scrubs and soaks , this is very good oil. I've purchased this brand many times and have never been disappointed. It was a very reasonably priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: NOW carrier oils always delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several NOW carrier oils & loved them all. I use Sweet Almond Oil for everything -- body, face, frizzy hair, and it more than delivers. Great for cold weather crackly, split skin. At its' low price, I don't mind slathering it on rough feet as well as hands. Not to mention legs, arms -- all over. Texture like silk; it just slides on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Toby B

customer_reviews.title: 1st timer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this oil and my hair loves it. Being all natural for 5 year has been a struggle. I have fine thin hair and seems like flat iron, wrap, frizz no matter what. This oil has changed my hair. plus has been growing alot more and less shedding! yes i said it. This is a great oil to have. No more frizz after flat iron can keep straight hair for a week love it
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom17

customer_reviews.title: Something's not right
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this same product in the 4oz size, and the 16 oz is different. The oil feels thicker, it doesn't absorb as well, leaving my skin feeling sticky. I also don't understand why this bigger bottle has no almond oil smell to it. I know its unscented, but it is still almond oil and should have that sweet almond oil smell right?? Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Love love this almond oil.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 62 years and my hands have become dry and I have the crepe hand syndrome that comes with age. This almond oil changed the feel if my hands. Soft, smooth and feel moisturized. I use it on my face, arms, elbows. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Villavicencio

customer_reviews.title: Done
customer_reviews.text: I really think i should get a refund this oil dries me out even more I’m disgusted with how they lied i suffer from sensitive skin and i don’t appreciate the way they advertise this
customer_reviews.author: IG @lora.stella

customer_reviews.title: There nothing "sweet" about this almond oil!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in that when I opened up the bottle of this almond oil, there was NO sweet scent. In fact it hardly had any scent at all. I love the smell of almond oil, but this bottle was sadly lacking. It's not rancid either...the expiry date is in 2022! Just wish it had smelled as lovely as I was led to believe it would by the description.
customer_reviews.author: MzTmOnA

customer_reviews.title: Healing, soft, and not drippy.
customer_reviews.text: I have such sensitive skin. This oil is thick, so you don’t need a ton- it spreads really well and isn’t drippy. Been using at night after a shower and my skin is healing, moisturizing and noticeably softer already. It feels better too. Very happy with this product. And there is no scent. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ShinerShawn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: This did not smell like the ones sold in stores Did not smell at all just plain oil
customer_reviews.author: Kariima S.

customer_reviews.title: amazing body oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It is so inexpensive and leaves my skin extremely moisturized. I put it on every day after showering and I don't even use moisturizer or body butter anymore, this kept my skin from getting dry this winter. For the price, you can't beat it. It also dries quickly unlike other oils so you can get dressed shortly after applying.
customer_reviews.author: PERRYS TEIN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil because my daughter, who has fine hair, needed a lighter oil for your precious curls and this oil has been amazingly moisturizing. It keeps her hair very moisturized for DAYS! I also use this for my thick/ high density hair in my homemade hair oil concoction and it has given so much shine & moisture. Sweet almond oil is great love-in protection!
customer_reviews.author: Bromista Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oil with the goal of using it as a base to mix homemade body oils. It's such good quality and packaging was perfect. I've used a bit already which explains why the photo doesn't show a full bottle. It doesn't have much of a smell which is great. I use it on my skin while it's still damp and my skin has never been softer. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Finders Keepers
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a couple of weeks because I got a breakout going on with having a mask on all day whilst at work. It has definitely helped cleared up rough spots on my face and dark spots where acne use to be. I do recommend using sunscreen to combine with or else your skin will feel oily all day and you’ll sweat it off within a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good castor oil for handmade soap
customer_reviews.text: I make soap and I've been buying this whenever I run out of my bulk orders from my regular suppliers. It makes great handmade soaps and the shipping is fast! Has been great for me when I'm low on supplies and need replacements in a pinch. Have had a great experience with this brand over all.
customer_reviews.author: Brookelynne Warra

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin so Soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this oil. I am not a fan of oil on my skin, leaving this greasy film behind but this old doesnt do that. It absorbs fast with no oily residue. My 6 year old likes it as well as my husband. The only down side is that it has no smell whatsoever. I wish it did smell like almond or something at else at least. I do recommend it and I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: stogie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This product is my holy grail. I use it every morning as my daily moisturizer and at night and it has helped my acne and dryness SO much. It’s making my eyebrows and eyelashes grow faster and it’s making my hair so nice and shiny. I feel with thjs product I get that nice, natural glow and I feel so beautiful. Everyone always says that oils clog your pores and cause acne but this is the opposite!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best addition to my skin regimen. In the past year, I have neglected my skin a lot because of work and life. This led to my skin getting really dry. I had not realized the neglect had changed the texture of my skin as well. It wasn’t until I started my new skin regimen that I realized my skin wasn’t soft anymore. That has changed dramatically. My skin and feet are silky soft again. I apply this almond oil immediately after a shower and then apply my body lotion as normal. It’s been such a game changer. I highly recommend this for anyone seeking a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Dare2B, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I liked how much product I got for the price. It doesn't have that sweet almond smell I was hoping for..but it is very moisturizing on my skin. I like to apply this oil sparingly to my body after I bathe and then apply my favorite body spray. I work at a very fast pace and combining the two keeps me fresh when my temperature goes up. I appreciate the fact that I was able to order from Amazon and receive it before my other brand ran out. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Nothing so spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Well, nothing so spectacular about it, it doesn’t have any scent and definitely doesn’t keep me well moisturized. I have to apply it about two time before I can feel any effect. I thought it was just me, but my boyfriend tried rubbing and said this doesn’t feel like body oil, it feel like cooking oil.
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is not organic and it does not say that it is plant based or can be used as a carrier oil. It does mention that it can be used as a moisturizer. Not what I thought it should be. It is non returnable so please read before you buy. Will not purchase any oils from this company ever again. Celeste
customer_reviews.author: Celeste M. Renteria

product_meta.title: NOW Solutions, Sweet Almond Oil, 100% Pure Moisturizing Oil, Promotes Healthy-Looking Skin, Unscented Oil, 16-Ounce
product_meta.description:
100% Pure Almond Oil is a natural oil that’s perfect for nourishing and reviving any skin type. Almond oil is easily absorbed and won’t clog pores, promoting clear, soft, healthy-looking skin. This skin-nourishing oil is ideal for the entire body and is derived from pressed almonds. Ingredient: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: 100% pure moisturizing oil/promotes healthy-looking skin: Sweet almond oil is a nourishing oil that's perfect for reviving any skin type. Almond oil is easily absorbed and won’t clog pores, promoting clear, soft, healthy-looking skin.

Odorless/non-gmo project verified: Almond oil is derived naturally from pressed almonds. This carrier oil is odorless/unscented. Combine with your favorite NOW Essential Oils to make a custom scented body, hair, or massage oil.

NOW Solutions is the next step in the evolution of personal care products, formulated with the finest functional ingredients from around the world. Not tested on animals. Analytically tested to assure the highest quality.

GMP quality assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
